title: Most menu actions should be disabled for customers from repo
description: Currently, most menu actions are enabled for customers from the repo, which should not be the case. These menu actions should be disabled for such customers. However, the rest of the description is meaningless and should be removed.
OB: Currently, menu actions are enabled for customers from the repo
EB: Menu actions should be disabled for customers from the repo
SR: Disable menu actions for customers from the repo
